install.name: Contacts and Leads Capture
install.author: Source Creativity
install.description: This is a new version of Leads Capture plugin, it allows you to capture data into Leads or Contacts in SugarCRM when a contact information are submitted through Joomla! contact form. Now you can capture the Joomla contact message into a predefined (description by default) or custom field in SugarCRM Leads or Contacts. It's very easy to setup, to use and it's free, enjoy !

param.name: mode
param.label: Capture as
param.description: Capture data as SugarCRM Leads or Contacts

param.name: msgfield
param.label: Associate the message to the Sugar field
param.description: Associate the message to SugarCRM custom field for exemple myfield_c, by default it is description
